EmailTemplate.name: Quote(s) is not Approved
EmailTemplate.subject: Quote(s) is not Approved - Employer Name: {!Proposal__c.Account_Name__c}/DBA: {!Proposal__c.DBA__c} Employer Type: {!Proposal__c.Email_Employer_Type__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
Your Quote: {!Proposal__c.Name} for {!Proposal__c.Account_Name__c}/DBA: {!Proposal__c.DBA__c}, {!Proposal__c.Email_Employer_Type__c} has been returned for review and re-submission by the Sales Team for the following:
Reason: {!ApprovalRequest.Comments}
Thank you.
